Class Lexer

java.lang.Object
  Lexer

public class Lexer
extends java.lang.Object

This program is a lexer for a straight-line program that is the subset of ML.

Author:
Ajay Roopakalu

Constructor Summary

          Perform lexical analysis on the file given by filename
